rows.label: qst701901_msg0001
rows.name: Dearie me...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0002
rows.name: What am I to do?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0003
rows.name: Are you OK?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0004
rows.name:
L-Laura? And Prince Adel...
and Emperor Hugo...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0005
rows.name:
If it please your lordships, do you have
a moment to listen?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0006
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0007
rows.name: My daughter Freja is very sick.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0008
rows.name:
Wotta-san offered us a place on his Divine Beast
ship, but she is too frail for a sea
voyage.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0009
rows.name:
She would not even survive the
journey to the harbor.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0010
rows.name:
Fred said we could take refuge in that
doodah he's had built in the basement
of the inn, but...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0011
rows.name:
With so many people and such stale air,
it's not the place for my Freja.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm at my wit's end. I want to do what's
best for her, but staying here gets
more dangerous every day.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0013
rows.name: That is indeed a predicament...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0014
rows.name:
Leave it to us! We'll take care of this
somehow! As soon as I can actually
think of something...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0015
rows.name:
It's in the nature of a parent to want
to do best by their child.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0016
rows.name: Freja-chan! We made it! We made it!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0017
rows.name: Made...what?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0018
rows.name:
Medicine, silly!
Medicine to cure you!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0019
rows.name: We worked really really hard.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0020
rows.name:
We collected 100 Dannagh Weta and
squeezed one drop of juice out of each
one to make the medicine!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0021
rows.name: What's a Dannagh Weta?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0022
rows.name:
It's a super rare insect from the
Dannagh Desert!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0023
rows.name: A bug?! I hate bugs!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0024
rows.name:
But...if you drink Marco's medicine,
you'll be able to come play outside
with us.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0025
rows.name: So you gotta drink, Freja!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0027
rows.name: OK.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0028
rows.name: *gulp*

rows.label: qst701901_msg0029
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Hruuoargh!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0030
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Yikes!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0031
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Freja-chan barfed!

rows.label: qst701901_msg0032
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Was it that gross?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0034
rows.name:
Those are good kids. They're always
looking out for my Freja.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0035
rows.name: Is there really nothing we can do?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0036
rows.name: There may be something.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0037
rows.name:
My journal tells of "Dragon Incense"
an Invidian panacea that can cure
any ailment

rows.label: qst701901_msg0038
rows.name:
It apparently saved their queen from an
incurable disease.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0039
rows.name: I, too, have heard of this.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0040
rows.name: Why don't we go looking for it?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0041
rows.name:
That seems to be the best course
of action.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0042
rows.name: Your lordships...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0043
rows.name:
Traveling to Invidia is too great of
a burden. I can't ask it of you.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0044
rows.name: That is sadly true.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0045
rows.name:
We cannot so readily abandon our
business with Metsu.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0046
rows.name: No...I understand...

rows.label: qst701901_msg0047
rows.name:
But fortunately we have allies whose
aid we can call upon.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0048
rows.name:
Let's head back to Aletta and speak
with Veronica.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0049
rows.name: Excellent idea, Adel.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0050
rows.name:
I'm sure there are loads of people in
the resistance who can lend a hand.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0051
rows.name: Shall we go, then?

rows.label: qst701901_msg0052
rows.name:
Marena-san, we might be gone a while,
but I promise we'll do what we can
to help. You can rely on us.

rows.label: qst701901_msg0053
rows.name: Thank you so much.
